description: Serve up this luxurious dinner in no time at all. With succulent sliced pork drizzled in gravy and served with tabbouleh, what’s not to love?
keywords: Roast pork,Roast,Stuffing,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Pumpkin,Dinner Made Easy
name: Rolled Roast Pork With Pumpkin Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg boneless rolled roast pork with pumpkin and pumpkin seed stuffing

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place pumpkin on tray. Drizzle with oil, then season. Roast for 15 minutes or until tender.
Place tabbouleh in a large bowl. Add pumpkin, tossing to combine. Season.
Place gravy in a small saucepan and bring to the boil, stirring occasionally, over medium heat.
Slice pork. Serve pork drizzled with gravy and with tabbouleh mixture.
